channel.title: doh on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in doh on Barefoot Rob

item.title: forgot Francois
item.description: 11:44 Friday 04 December 2015 JST I just realized I forgot to bring Francois, and I’m sure Mayumi will ask about him tonight at the end of year party.

item.title: bunch of 0 byte files
item.description: 22:22 Friday 06 November 2015 JST Email I wrote to Fred: I just ran a script that was supposed to create thumbnails of images as needed, but it created a bunch of 0 byte files in a bunch of directories. So I want a script which will delete 0 byte files and then a script which will delete empty directories. I'll run the second script N times (10 should be enough) because they're not toooo deep.

item.title: bah kamata
Jennie got out and it was pretty much my fault
item.description: 12:10 Friday 17 April 2015 JST As Lin left this morning, she was like, “don’t let Jennie out!” and I was like, “of course!” and I noticed that I could put the chain on the door so it only opens this much she wouldn’t be able to get out. That way she’ll be safe and happy! oh shit she getting out! I tried to close the door to carefully hold her without crushing her (cats hate that!
